name: BubbleGum-Push
description: Simple, Challenging, Fun, and Free! Fight your way to the top of a cute little gum-ball-machine! A simple and cozy game that will have you hooked in an effort to win prize after prize! Ladies....Gentlemen: BubbleGum-Push!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel 620 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 40 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
